entry.title: Commit Style Guide
entry.summary: This style guide is the collection of precise rulesets that makes reviewing the Git commit messages and project history easier for everyone.

entry.title: Hosting New Project
entry.summary: We're excited to have your project hosted with us. To ensure a seamless experience for contributors, maintainers, and users, please adhere to the following guidelines:

entry.title: About Us
entry.summary: Welcome to N3N, where innovation meets cybersecurity excellence! At N3N, we are on a mission to redefine the landscape of digital privacy and security. Our commitment to an open-source approach, coupled with a community-driven spirit, forms the foundation of our initiatives.

entry.title: Contact Us
entry.summary: We're thrilled to connect with you! Whether you have questions, suggestions, or simply want to say hello, we'd love to hear from you. Here are the various ways you can reach out to the N3N team:

entry.title: Acknowledgement
entry.summary: N3N's success is a collaborative effort, and we extend our heartfelt appreciation to all those who have contributed to our projects. Each line of code, every suggestion, and the dedication of our community members have played a crucial role in shaping N3N. Here, we recognize and thank:

entry.title: Terms of Use
entry.summary: Welcome to the N3N Community! Before you dive into our vibrant space, please take a moment to review our Terms of Use:

entry.title: Trademark Policy
entry.summary: This Trademark Policy outlines the guidelines for the use of trademarks owned by N3N in the context of the N3N Community. These trademarks include, but are not limited to, the N3N name and the N3N Frontier Wolf logo.

entry.title: The N3N Philosophy
entry.summary: In the heart of our community lies the wisdom that echoes simplicity and kindness.

entry.title: Contribute to N3N
entry.summary: The N3N division contributor guidelines is an invitation letter to all the people out there who believes in the power of technology through contribution, making lives better for everyone.

entry.title: Contributor Terms
entry.summary: Contribute to N3N projects with the assurance that your work is appreciated, protected by clear licensing terms, and aligned with a collaborative and respectful community, as outlined in our Contributor Terms.

entry.title: Guide to DCO
entry.summary: In the vibrant realm of open-source development, collaboration is key. To streamline contributions and ensure a harmonious coding environment, many projects adopt the Developer Certificate of Origin (DCO). This certificate, often abbreviated as DCO, serves as a guideline for contributors, fostering a culture of openness and clarity.

entry.title: Vendoring Guide
entry.summary: Managing dependencies is a crucial aspect of maintaining healthy and sustainable open-source projects. This document outlines guidelines for effective vendoring in N3N projects, providing clarity on versioning, tagging, and maintaining changelogs.

entry.title: FAQ
entry.summary: Welcome to the Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) section! Here, we've compiled answers to some common queries about N3N. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to ask in the relevant channel or reach out to our support.

entry.title: Join Us at N3N!

entry.title: Our Mission
entry.summary: N3N is on a mission to empower a secure digital future, fostering innovation, collaboration, and inclusivity in our community-driven pursuit of privacy and cybersecurity excellence.
